</title>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 23 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

---

The face of this [standard-grade silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=316) [salvo shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=15) (Hardness 7, HP 28, BT 14) is polished to a mirror finish.
